description.text: This ring is forged from black iron and shining silver. If the wearer can cast summon monster spells, he adds paracletus to the 3rd-level list of monsters he can summon, adds theletos to the 6th-level list, and adds akhana to the 9th-level list. Also, once per day the wearer summon a paracletus, as if by the summon monster III spell.
